entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 25. Humidex 27. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
